articles.description: In what turned out to be a bloodbath in the Indian stock market last month, Sensex and Nifty50 plummeted around 2500 points and 900 points respectively in June. As of June 30th 2022, the market cap of all BSE-listed companies slipped to Rs 243.65 lakh crore, …
